<a id="english"></a>
## English

### Our Pledge

We pledge to respect Amane Kanata and all Heimin, maintaining a warm and welcoming community.

### Prohibited Behavior

The following behaviors are prohibited:

- **Discriminatory or offensive remarks** - Discrimination based on race, gender, religion, nationality, etc.
- **Political content** - Political discussions or claims
- **Harassment** - Personal attacks, stalking, threats
- **Copyright infringement** - Using others' work without permission
- **Spam** - Promotional posts or unrelated content

### Enforcement

- Violating content will be removed without notice
- Severe cases may result in access restrictions
- Repeated violations may lead to permanent access restrictions

### Reporting

If you find violating content, please report it via [Content Report](https://github.com/bcoffee0630/kanata-graduation-tribute/issues/new?template=report-content.yml).
